schema.name: verification_result
schema.description: Stores multi-agent truth verification results for a declarative statement.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for each data of this entity.

fields.name: data_creator
fields.description: id of the user who creates the record

fields.name: data_updater
fields.description: id of the user who updates the record

fields.name: declarative_statement_id
fields.description: Reference to the declarative statement being verified.

fields.name: claude_verification
fields.description: JSON string containing the verification result from Claude.

compliance.reason: Internal verification data from a third-party service.

fields.name: fetch_ai_verification
fields.description: JSON string containing the verification result from Fetch.ai.

compliance.reason: Internal verification data from a third-party service.

fields.name: gemini_verification
fields.description: JSON string containing the verification result from Gemini.

compliance.reason: Internal verification data from a third-party service.

fields.name: bright_data_verification
fields.description: JSON string containing the verification result from Bright Data.

compliance.reason: Internal verification data from a third-party service.

fields.name: lava_gateway_consensus
fields.description: JSON string containing the consensus result from Lava Gateway.

fields.name: is_false_statement
fields.description: Flag indicating if the consensus determines the statement to be false.

compliance.reason: Final outcome of the verification process.

fields.name: correct_information
fields.description: The corrected information if the statement was found to be false.

compliance.reason: Publicly verifiable correct information to counter misinformation.
